text: Miroslav Zikmund (14 February 1919 – 1 December 2021) was a Czech travel writer and explorer. He was known for his works with Jiří Hanzelka. The two became known as Hanzelka and Zikmund and made many movies about their travels. Zikmund died in Prague on 1 December 2021 at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech movie directors Category:Czech writers Category:Explorers Category:Centenarians
title: Miroslav Zikmund
